parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions Calin Georgescu and Lasconi, implicitly referencing a competition between them. While not explicitly naming parties, the context strongly suggests a political rivalry within the PSD, given the mention of PSD mayors.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed for wide public reach. The statement "Mai multi primari PSD din Neamt sustin..." indicates a claim affecting a larger group of people.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The core message implies an attempt to influence voters by suggesting that PSD mayors are urging support for Calin Georgescu to prevent Lasconi from winning. This is a clear attempt to sway public opinion in favor of one candidate over another.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It presents a biased claim, lacking verifiable evidence and promoting a specific candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While presented as a report, the post's intent is not to simply express an opinion but to actively influence the electoral outcome by promoting one candidate and undermining another.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1294526935229404</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, a paid advertisement, directly mentions Calin Georgescu and Lasconi in a context that strongly suggests an attempt to influence voters in their favor/against. The claim that PSD mayors are urging support for Georgescu to prevent Lasconi's victory is a clear attempt to manipulate public opinion during the election period. The post lacks journalistic objectivity and neutrality, instead promoting a specific candidate within the PSD.  The fact that it's a paid advertisement targeting a wide audience further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Calin Georgescu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Lasconi</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Fruncea</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Fruncea], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări plătite (ID 1294526935229404) care conține propagandă electorală, având ca efect influențarea voturilor în favoarea lui Calin Georgescu și împotriva lui Lasconi. Postarea susține, fără dovezi, că primari PSD din Neamț au fost instruiți să direcționeze voturile către Georgescu, fapt ce constituie o manipulare a opiniei publice în perioada electorală și o încălcare a prevederilor legale privind interzicerea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Această postare, având în vedere caracterul său public și platforma utilizată (Facebook), se adresează unui public larg, având ca obiectiv clar influențarea votului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
